p: Overall, despite the indications that SARS-CoV-2 infection might have an influence on normal hepatic functions and the fact that drugs are used for the treatment of COVID-19 that have proven hepatotoxic properties (whether or not due to overdosing), more mechanistic studies regarding SARS-CoV-2 entry and replication in liver cells and the potential consequences of medication for vital organs, including the liver, are warranted.
